SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ChatApp
GUI of a chat app client.
ClientImpl
Implementation of the client, this function is what is called when a client wishes to log in.
ClientMessages
Class used to receive messages from server and send them to the GUI
ClientMessagesInterface
Interface of the ClientMessage, that is used by the server to send message to the client.
ColoredTextPane
This whole function was initialy found here : https://stackoverflow.com/a/9652143 And modified to suit our needs.
ConnexionClient
This class launches the connection client Once the program exits, an actionlistener is triggered in ClientImpl and the execution continues.
FileLoader
This class loads the content of a file, makes it possible to append lines etc.
HelloServer
Server class, launching the server stub, and initializing it
Info_itf
Interface of the info class
Info_itf_Impl
Class containing two strings, to send infos about the client easily.
Security
Security class to hash strings in salted sha-256, for safer password storage Uses SecureRandom instead of Random.
Server
Server interface
ServerApp
GUI of the server, to show the logs
ServerImpl
Server Class, doing all the server skulduggery and creating links between all the users.
Tools
Tools set used around
UserData
UserData class to manipulate easily user - salt - password
